alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Calcasieu Parish through 645 PM CDT... At 630 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gillis, or near Moss Bluff, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Westlake, Moss Bluff, and Lebleu Settlement. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 27 and 39. Interstate 210 between mile markers 8 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
